channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Experts issue warning on ocean phenomenon that could impact hurricane season: 'It's been notable over the month'
5 Best Passive Income Ideas From Mark Cuban That You Would Be a Fool To Ignore
Senate Democrats walk out of committee vote to advance Trump court pick Emil Bove
Russian banks prepare for bailouts as Putin’s war hammers economy
Israel bombs Gaza’s only Catholic church
1.4M of the nation’s poorest renters risk losing their homes with Trump’s proposed HUD time limit
item.description: A Trump administration proposal could put more than a million low-income households at risk of losing their government-subsidized housing.

item.title: WATCH: Mysterious Pride flag-wearing robot spotted in Hollywood
item.description: Some California motorists were shocked to see a cowboy hat-wearing robot draped in Pride flags running through West Hollywood.

item.title: WATCH: Stealthy squirrel steals chicken snack from stroller at EPCOT
item.description: "Good for you, bud," one impressed onlooker could be heard saying as the crafty critter made its getaway.

item.title: Plane crash kills 1 and injures 2 in remote area of Olympic National Park

item.title: Families, kids most at risk of losing HUD housing with Trump’s proposed time limits
Mark Zuckerberg settles lawsuit over Cambridge Analytica scandal, reports say
item.description: The reported settlement comes a day after an $8 billion class-action lawsuit began in court.

item.title: Deadly lightning strike in New Jersey
item.description: Children are among those injured after a sudden lightning strike in Jackson Township, New Jersey, according to officials. CBS News New York's Christin...

item.title: Former Eagles' LB Bryan Braman dies at 38 after cancer battle
item.description: Former Philadelphia Eagles linebacker Bryan Braman has died after a battle with a rare, aggressive form of cancer. He was 38.

item.title: 17-year-old arrested in murder of Maine paddleboarder
item.description: An arrest has been made in the murder of Sunshine Stewart, a paddleboarder who went missing in Maine earlier this month.

item.title: What new summer spending data says about the economy
item.description: Jill Schlesinger explains what the new June retail and food sales data tells us about consumer habits and economic confidence.

item.title: Camp Mystic leader may not have seen urgent alert before Texas flood, family spokesman says
